name: lucid-cardano
description: Lucid is a library, which allows you to create Cardano transactions and off-chain code for your Plutus contracts in JavaScript and Node.js.

scripts.release: npm run test && npm run build && node scripts/prerelease.js && npm publish && node scripts/postrelease.js
scripts.package: node scripts/prerelease.js && npm pack && node scripts/postrelease.js && mkdir -p lucid-cardano && rm -rf lucid-cardano/* && tar zxvf lucid-cardano-*.tgz -C lucid-cardano && mv lucid-cardano/package/* lucid-cardano/ && rm -r lucid-cardano/package && rm lucid-cardano-*.tgz

hooks.pre-push: npm run test && npm run build

author: Alessandro Konrad
